altTitles.ja: ？？？ランクの裏装備無双

description.en:
A young man named Jinfrey, decides to become an adventurer in order to earn a lot of money and make his family happy.

However, the moment he tries to become an adventurer, Jinfrey remembers the memory of his previous life.

This world that Jinfrey was born and raised, was exactly the same world as “Ground Seven”, a shitty game that he played in his previous life to the point where he was called a “Hardcore Player” !

Although confused by the suddenly revived memories, by using this knowledge, Jinfrey aims to become unparalleled with the help of the secret “Hidden Equipment” in this world.

title.en: Isekai Kaeri no Saikyou Tamer, Tsukai ma wa Osananajimi

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りの最強テイマー、使い魔は幼馴染

altTitles.id: Penjinak Terkuat Kembali Dari Dunia Lain Dengan Teman Masa Kecilnya sebagai Familiarnya

altTitles.en: The Strongest Tamer Returned From Another World With His Childhood Friend as His Familiar

description.en:
“But I’m powerless without you, my Master.”

After being suddenly summoned to another world and saving that world from a crisis, high school students Wataru and Rumi have safely made it back to the real world. But the real world has been completely transformed! Dungeons are popping up and people have awakened their skills… It’s as if the real world is turning into the world they just left behind…

A dungeon fantasy story where the returnees from another world, the tamer Wataru and his familiar Rumi, mow down everything in their way as the strongest combination that is closer than childhood friends but not quite lovers!

Jiang Xiaoman, a university student and online writer, inherits a mysterious job from her father. Working as the archdemon Qin Lan's assistant, she begins to tackle strange cases with Qin Lan. As the two clashing personalities band together to solve each bizarre yet heart-rending case, they develop special feelings towards each other.

title.en: Saikyou Yuusha Party wa Ai ga Shiritai

altTitles.ja: 最強勇者パーティーは愛が知りたい

altTitles.en: Hero's Party Want to Experience LOVE

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyō Yūsha Pātī wa Ai ga Shiritai

description.en:
The strong and popular hero won't let me (the unpopular mage) go for some reason!!!
The adventures of the strongest hero's party is full of strange love.

title.en: Heavenly Demon Wants to Be A Chef

description.en:
Due to a gate-related accident, Woojin regains the memories of his past life... a life as the Heavenly Demon, ruler of China! 

However, as the Heavenly Demon, there was a dream he never managed to achieve. Now, in this life, he'll do whatever it costs to fulfill his lifelong dream of becoming a chef! 

This is the legendary(?) story of Cheon Woojin, the former Heavenly Demon, chasing his dreams!
description.id:
Woojin menyadari kehidupan masa lalunya melalui insiden Monster Gate.
Dia adalah… Heavenly Demon yang menaklukan Dataran Tengah!
Bahkan ketika dia adalah Heavenly Demon, dia memiliki mimpi yang tidak dapat dia capai…
Dia pasti akan mencapainya kali ini.

Impiannya adalah menjadi chef!

title.en: The Ten Thousand Clans Invasion: Guardian of the Rear

altTitles.zh: 万族入侵：全民参战，我留守后方

altTitles.zh-ro: Wan Zu Ru Qin: Quanmin Canzhan, Wo Liushou Houfang

altTitles.en: Invasion of All Races: All the People Join the War, I Stay Behind

description.en: Invasion of the Ten Thousand Clans, universal superpowers, the era beyond time has arrived! In this age, all citizens are drafted to resist the foreign races and defend against external humiliation. Nan Ziying, at the tender age of adulthood, chooses to stay behind at the recruitment center, serving as logistical support. Many soldiers are disappointed, the youth scorn him, and white-haired elders take up arms and leave, leaving him behind with only women, children, and the elderly to guard the rear. Later, Nan Ziying awakens five great abilities and silently prepares. In this era where countless clans reign supreme and the times are filled with tragic heroism, ‘I am the calamity of these ten thousand clans!'

title.en: The Magic Genius of the Marquis House

altTitles.en: The Magic Genius of the Marquis

description.en:
"To stay alive… I have no choice but to become a genius. From today, I’ll do my best, so please support me." 
Lee Hyun-woo finds himself possessing Kyle Seltarion, an extra character from a game where he used to reign as the world’s number one player.  
Considering the game’s storyline, he soon faces the imminent death of Kyle, who, on top of being on death's door, can't use magic or aura and has a terrible reputation. How did he end up in the body of such a character?  
However, after discovering a new talent, he learns to harness mana and begins to shift his attributes and reputation with knowledge of hidden routes gained through grinding in the game.  
His immediate goal is to save his own life, but that goal is closely linked to the impending global catastrophe...  
To overcome this situation, he needs to gather allies and boost his reputation! It's time to turn his past, which was a reckless mess, around and move into a new phase!

National Intelligence Service black ops agent 'Suhyeok' is tasked with assassinating 'Nanayama,' the Yakuza leader heading a drug trafficking organization in Korea. To his surprise, the target is a captivating woman named 'Anna,' who appears disconnected from any violence. Sensing something amiss with his mission, Suhyeok embarks on a path of vengeance against both the National Intelligence Service, which has betrayed him, and 'Nanayama,' who massacred his comrades.

title.en: Return of the King of Hell

altTitles.en: Reincarnation Path of The Underworld King

description.en: The underworld has collapsed. In the barren land where blood should flow, now clear water flows, and the cauldron that used to boil the souls has long since gone cold. The retired King of Underworld, in pursuit of his own happiness, seeks the path of reincarnation. However, due to the chaos in Underworld and the disappearance of his successor, he is unable to walk the path of reincarnation. To become a god in the human world and to track down the missing successor, The King of Underworld descends to the human world. But the human world is in chaos due to the escape of the deceased from Hell, orchestrated by his successor’s masterful plan. The King of Underworld joins forces with the ‘Guardians of the Life’ who protect humans, using the power of the Hell’s ledger, in a struggle to capture his successor and restore the world to its original state. Will King of Underworld be able to safely walk the path of reincarnation?

altTitles.en: The Demonic Cult Leader Is Too Reluctant

description.en:
Despite my position as the young leader of the Demonic Cult, all I ever wanted was a simple life.

However, after my father, Heavenly Demon Asura, passed away and a rebellion erupted, I was forced to flee the cult. I believed I could finally live the life I had always longed for, but... my father's confidant, Poong Cheon, insisted that I must become the 16th cult leader.

Was it just my imagination, or was something more ominous than becoming the leader of the Demonic Cult about to unfold in the future?

altTitles.ja: 二度生きるランカー

altTitles.en: Ranker Who Lives A Second Time

altTitles.th: เกมชีวิตที่สอง ของแรงเกอร์

description.en:
Yeonwoo’s brother disappeared years ago, and he’s devastated to learn of his death.

As he copes with his loss, he’s given a pocket watch and learns there’s more to his brother’s death: he was betrayed while competing in the Tower of the Sun God.

Now it’s Yeonwoo’s turn to use the knowledge his brother left behind.

Can Yeonwoo navigate that world and gain enough power and experience to reach the top of the tower, defeating his brother’s enemies and all those who stand in his way?

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%91%90-%EB%B2%88-%EC%82%AC%EB%8A%94-%EB%9E%AD%EC%BB%A4/2335)
description.fr:
Yeon-woo avait un frère jumeau qui a disparu il y a cinq ans. Un jour, une montre de poche laissée par son frère est retournée en sa possession. À l'intérieur, il a trouvé un journal intime caché dans lequel on pouvait lire : "Le temps que tu entendes ceci, je serai déjà mort…".  
l'Obélisque, la Tour du Dieu Soleil, un monde où plusieurs univers et dimensions se croisent. Dans ce monde, son frère avait été victime d'une trahison en montant la tour. Après avoir appris la vérité, Yeon-woo décida d'escalader la tour avec le journal de son frère.  
Yeon-woo passe ensuite par les mêmes épreuves que son frère cadet et combat en tant que joueur anonyme. Son but ? Vaincre la Tour de l'Obélisque et venger son frère.
description.id: Setelah 5 tahun hilang, Cha Yeonwoo menemukan fakta bahwa adiknya, Cha Jungwoo, sudah meninggal. Ketika membongkar barang peninggalan adiknya, dia menemukan sebuah jam saku. Jam saku itu adalah hadiahnya untuk Jungwoo supaya lulus ujian. Begitu membuka jam tersebut, Cha Yeonwoo mendengar suara adiknya yang menceritakan kehidupannya selama 5 tahun ini. Ternyata Cha Jungwoo bukan hilang melainkan terdampar di dunia lain. Di dunia itu pula Cha Jungwoo dikhianati dan dibunuh. Mendengar itu, amarah Cha Yeonwoo bangkit. Dia berniat balas dendam atas kematian adiknya. Berbekal pengetahuan yang dia dapat dari Jungwoo, Cha Yeonwoo pun pergi ke dunia lain tersebut. Berhasilkah Cha Yeonwoo balas dendam?!
description.it:
Yeon-woo aveva un fratello gemello scomparso cinque anni fa…  
Un giorno, un orologio da tasca lasciato da suo fratello è tornato in suo possesso. Dentro, ha trovato un diario nascosto nel quale è stato registrato “Quando ascolterai questo, immagino che sarò già morto …”
description.ja: ある日豪の元に届いた双子の弟・駿の訃報。 虚無感を感じる彼の元に駿の懐中時計が届く。 そして豪はその中に隠された駿の日記によって、 駿が道半ばで力尽きた太陽神の塔・オベリスクへと誘われていく―。 弟の復讐に燃える豪が挑む、痛快アクションファンタジー！
description.ko:
5년 전 사라진 쌍둥이 동생을 잊고 살던 연우.
어느날 그에게 동생의 유품인 회중시계가 돌아왔다.

그리고 그 속에 숨겨진 일기장.

'형이 이 일기를 들을 때 즈음이라면 나는 이미 이 세상 사람이 아니겠지.'

여러 차원과 우주가 교차하는 세계에 놓인 태양의 신 탑, 오벨리스크.
그리고 그곳에 오르다 배신당해 눈을 감아야 했던 동생.

모든 걸 알게 된 연우는 동생이 남겨 둔 일기와 함께 탑을 오르기 시작한다.

'오늘부터 난. 차정우이다.'
description.ru:
Ёну в течение 5 лет жил, смирившись с исчезновением своего младшего брата-близнеца. Однажды ему в руки попали карманные часы его брата.​ Внутри них он обнаружил спрятанную записку.​ «Брат, если ты сейчас слушаешь эти записи, то меня уже нет на Земле». Узнав о том, что его младший брат отправился в Обелиск — башню богов, которая находится где-то в космосе на пересечении нескольких измерений, и был предан, Ёну решает отправиться туда сам.
«С этого момента я буду Ча Чонъу.​»
description.th: ชายอนอู ชายหนุ่มที่น้องชายหายตัวไป พร้อมกับต้องเสียแม่ไปเพราะโรคร้ายได้ ได้ตัดสินใจไปเป็นทหารอาสาสมัครที่ประเทศแอฟริกา จนอยู่มาวันนึงเขาได้ค้นพบความจริงว่า น้องชายของเขาได้หายตัวไปขณะกำลังตามหา 'ยาอายุวัฒนะ' ของอีกโลกหนึ่ง เพื่อนำมารักษาแม่ พร้อมกับถ่ายโอนพลังทิ้งไว้แก่เขา
description.tr: Yeon-woo’nun kardeşi beş yıl önce ortadan kaybolmuştur. Bir gün kardeşinden kalan bir cep saati eline geçer. İçinde, kardeşinin bırakmış olduğu gizli bir günlüğün olduğunu fark eder. ”Sen bunu bulduğunda, ben çoktan bu dünyadan göçmüş olacağım.” Obelisk, güneş tanrısının kulesi, farklı evrenler ve boyutların iç içe geçtiği bir dünyadır. Kardeşi, bu dünyada kuleye tırmanmaya çalışırken ihanete uğrayıp hayatını kaybetmiştir. Gerçeği öğrenmiş olan Yeon-woo, kardeşinin günlüğü ile birlikte kuleye tırmanmaya karar verir. ”Şu andan itibaren ben, Cha Jeong-woo’yum.”
description.zh-hk:
延宇選擇遺忘5年前消失的雙胞胎弟弟，
過上屬於自己的生活，
卻在某天收到了弟弟的遺物——懷錶。

而在那懷錶之中，還隱藏著弟弟的日誌。

「當哥聽見我的日誌時，
也代表我已經不在這個世界上了吧。」

方尖碑——各個次元與宇宙交會的太陽神之塔。

弟弟就是在攻塔過程中遭受背叛，不幸喪命。

於是，得知一切真相的延宇帶著弟弟留下的日誌，
踏上了攻塔之路!

title.en: Ore to Kimitachi no Dungeon Sensou

altTitles.en: Dungeon War Between You and Me

altTitles.zh-hk: 我和你們的地下城戰爭

altTitles.ja: 俺と君達のダンジョン戦争

description.en:
In the year 2045AD, Earth is invaded by four different worlds. To defend the planet, one must conquer the dungeons connected to each of these other worlds.  Each country selects Explorers to take on this task, and Gunma, an ordinary man chosen in Japan, is suddenly thrown into the front lines of the attack! 

Scared and overequipped, he activates his [Listening[ and [EnemyDetection] skills. Then, he encounters the strongest and most beautiful girl in all of mankind! While being pushed around by the girl, who is too strong for her own good but has a tofu mentality, he rushes through the dungeon at breakneck speed... 

This is an unprecedented dungeon fantasy that loosely knocks down everything!
description.ja:
西暦2045年、地球は4つの異世界から侵攻された。防衛するには、各異世界と繋がるダンジョンの攻略が必須。その責務を担う《探索者》を各国が選出し、日本で選ばれた平凡男・グンマは突如、攻略最前線に放り込まれてしまう！

ビビりまくり、過度な重装備で〈聞き耳〉や〈索敵〉スキル発動中に出会ったのは、人類最強の美少女!?強すぎてヤベェ割には豆腐メンタルな彼女に振り回されつつ、破竹の勢いでダンジョン攻略を進んでいくのだが…？

ゆるっと全てをなぎ倒す、前人未踏のダンジョンファンタジー！

altTitles.ja: ナノ魔神

description.en:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.

description.id:
Setelah mengalami cobaan berat pada hidupnya, Tiba tiba Chun yeowun mendapatkan pertolongan tidak terduga dari keturunannya di masa depan yang memasukkan teknologi nano ke dalam tubuhnya! Mampukah Chun Yeowun menjadi master bela diri dengan menggunakan kekuatan nano mashin!?

description.ja:
「未来の力を手に入れ、邪悪な魔教に立ち向かう！」 魔教の私生児として生まれた主人公・天黎雲。 幼い頃から卑しまれ、後継者争いで命を狙われる。 死に物狂いの抵抗もむなしく、危うく命を落としかねない絶体絶命のピンチに･･･！ その瞬間、突如現れた謎の男から「ナノマシン」と呼ばれる未来の力を注入され、 目覚めるととてつもない力を手に入れていた。 魔教を超え、最強の武人を目指す天黎雲の物語が幕を開ける！

description.ko:
갖은 멸시와 목숨의 위협을 받던 마교의 사생아 천여운, 
미래에서 나타난 후손이 천여운의 몸에 나노 머신을 주입한 후 그의 인생이 송두리째 바뀐다.
마교를 넘어 무림 최고의 자리에 오르기 위한 천여운의 거침없는 이야기가 시작된다!

description.ru:
Чен Еун — незаконнорожденный принц, появившийся на свет без единой частички Нейгуна. С самого раннего детства он находился под гнетом всеобщего отвращения. Весь забитый, с отсутствием какой-либо мотивации, год за годом Еун влачил свое жалкое существование. Ни на что не рассчитывая... и не претендуя.

Будучи изгоем, исконно презираемым шестью великими кланами, в один прекрасный день он оказался в окружении десятка подосланных убийц. Когда глаза практически застлала пелена белого света... и казалось, он уже начал теряться, проваливаясь в пучину... безграничного отчаяния, на горизонте возникла еле заметная фигура.

Неизвестный "потомок", снизошедший из будущего, в мгновение ока уничтожил всех врагов. Прошептав нечто невнятное, он подсадил в тело нашего героя какой-то странный предмет... наномашину. С этого момента все кардинально переменилось. Поселившийся где-то внутри искусственный интеллект дал его жизни невероятный толчок.

Больше не будет как прежде. Это... новая ветвь истории. Истории о парне, который бросил вызов небесам.
description.th:
เรื่องราวของชอนยออุนลูกนอกสมรสภายในพรรคมารที่ได้เป็นเทวบุตรมารรุ่นที่ 2 และอยู่เหนือประมุขพรรคมาร

无名小卒却有了神秘机器，
或许我也能挑战一下魔神？
魔教私生子天如运饱受蔑视和生命威胁，某天来自未来的后人突然出现，给天如运的身体注入了纳米机器，从此他的人生发生了翻天覆地的变化。

description.pt-br: Depois de ser desdenhado e ter sua vida em perigo, Cheon Yeo-Woon, um órfão do culto demoníaco, recebeu uma visita inesperada de seu descendente do futuro, que inseriu nele uma micro máquina, que mudou drasticamente a vida de Cheon Yeo-Woon após sua ativação. A história da jornada de Cheon Yeo-Woon no culto demoníaco e sua subida para se tornar o melhor nas artes marciais acabou de começar.

在魔教少教主候選人中排名最後的天如運，是個運氣極差的人。 某天，來自未來的後代突然穿越時空出現，並且將奈米機器注入他的身體，徹底翻轉了他的人生。

title.en: Kimi no Risou no Maid ni Naru!

altTitles.ja: キミの理想のメイドになる！

description.en: A few months into his high school life, Renya Nijou has no friends or girlfriend and spends his days living alone. But one day, he witnesses how Maya Kamishiro, the most beautiful girl in his class, was about to be kidnapped by mysterious men dressed in black, apparently Maya was sold by her parents to pay their debts, so Renya decides to help her with the financial resources he got through investments, but Maya can't help but want to return the favor, and declares that she will become Renya's maid...?
description.ja: 高校生活が始まって数ヶ月、二条廉也は友人も彼女もおらず、さらに一人暮らしという孤独な日々を送っていた。だがある日、クラス一の美少女、神城真夜が謎の黒服の男たちに連れ去られそうになっているところを目撃する。真夜は借金の片に両親に売られそうになっていたのだ。そんな彼女を廉也は投資などで築いた財力を元手に助けるのだが、恩を返さずにはいられない真夜は廉也のメイドになることを宣言し……！？

title.en: My Wife is a Heavenly Big Shot

altTitles.zh: 我的妻子是大乘期大佬

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Qizi Shi Dacheng Qi Da Lao
Wǒ De Qīzi Shì Dàchéng Qí Dà Lǎo

description.en: The opening scene mentions a wife who has reached her power ceiling, who still wants a bicycle, and demands to eat only soft rice?! But when Xiao Yifeng said I was really your husband, I was nearly strangled to death by this future wife… something’s not right, I must have taken the wrong script!
description.zh: 开局喜提战力天花板的妻子，还要啥自行车，软饭硬吃？！可当萧逸枫说出我真是你夫君的时候，险些没被这未来妻子直接掐死……不对，我一定是拿错剧本了！

title.en: I Rely on My Invincibility to Deal Tons of Damage Passively!

altTitles.zh: 我靠无敌被动打出成吨伤害！

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Kao Wudi Beidong Dachu Cheng Dun Shanghai!
Wǒ Kào Wúdí Bèidòng Dǎchū Chéng Dūn Shānghài!

description.en: In his previous life, Cheng Qianmo attained the prestigious title of ‘God’ across all professions in the game ‘Genesis,’ poised to ascend to the pinnacle of the gaming world. However, just when he stood on the cusp of becoming the game’s top player, he suffered a regrettable defeat. Yet, fate granted Cheng Qianmo a second chance as he unexpectedly traversed into a world with a setting eerily identical to ‘Genesis,’ a world where everyone could switch professions freely. Armed with the god-tier title across all professions, he resolves to rectify his past regrets, embarking on a path no one has ever tread before.
description.zh: 前一世，程谦墨在游戏《天启》获得了全职业神职称呼，即将站上世界之巅，但在距离游戏第一人仅有一步之遥时，遗憾败北。可世界给了程谦墨第二次的机会，让他意外穿越到了一个设定竟然与《天启》一模一样，全民转职的世界。拥有全职业神级称号的他，决定完成曾经的遗憾，走上一条从未有人走过的道路。

altTitles.en: I Made a Contract With Myself

description.en: This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

altTitles.en: You are a Four Leaf Clover

altTitles.ja: きみは四葉のクローバー

description.ja: かつての人気者で、今は過激ないじめを受ける宇一。そんな彼の前に突然現れた初恋の相手・よつは。可愛く健気な彼女の目的とは一体…!?
description.vi: Câu chuyện romcom nhẹ nhàng về hành trình chữa lành trái tim đã tan vỡ của main
description.zh: 某天，曾很有人气的宇一的生活陡然一变。 以往光芒四射的日子被用抹布也无法擦去的黑暗所笼罩。 这时，熟悉宇一过去的初恋—— 四叶突然出现在了他的面前。 她的目的究竟是…！？

description.en:
“The complex of the boy, Choi Si-woo, is being overweight. Choi Si-woo runs and runs around his house until past midnight, and he encounters an old man on a walking trail. In the blink of an eye, the old man covers Choi Si-woo with the straw backpack he is carrying. Where Choi Si-woo had stumbled upon was an enormously wide ruined traditional Korean house (hanok).

At the edge of the spacious courtyard, surrounding him on the courtyard, there were numerous black shadows standing. To the bewildered Choi Si-woo, the old man speaks. Once every 666 years, a ceremony is held to select the king of Yokai and each Yokai in this world possesses one entry ticket for it. And Choi Si-woo is, in fact, a hybrid of a human and a goblin, inheriting the blood of an extinct goblin. Among the goblin folk, only Choi Si-woo possesses the entry ticket. As the sole survivor inheriting the blood of a goblin, the adventure of the half-monster boy, Choi Si-woo, begins.”

altTitles.th: สงครามเย็นสุดขั้ว

description.en: The Ice Age apocalypse is coming. After being betrayed and killed by my secret crush, I was reborn and gained a magical ability - the snacks I ate suddenly turned into plants? What's surprising is that this ability can be used in this way... Crisis is everywhere, I want to live for myself in this life!

title.en: Evolution Begins With a Big Tree

altTitles.zh-ro: Cóng Dà Shù Kāishǐ De Jìnhuà

altTitles.ja: 進化する者たち

altTitles.vi: Chuyển Sinh Thành Liễu Đột Biến

altTitles.ru: Моё перерождение в древо: Начало эволюции

description.en:
Reborn as a willow tree!? Resurrection of spiritual energy, rise of all things. The reborn willow has also embarked on the path of evolution. It can evolve infinitely, is it “divine power” or “curse”?

Official Translations:
[Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/146958)
description.ru:
После смерти Юй Цзыюй перерождается и становится… Ивой! 
И неизвестно, сумеет ли он приспособиться к такой знакомой, но в то же время чуждой окружающей среде – ведь так совпало, что его перерождение случилось как раз во время Великой эпохи возрождения духовной энергии. 
Возрождение духовной энергии знаменует возвышение всех существ… 
Рев хищных зверей стал способен сотрясти горы и взволновать реки, а существа с могущественной силой наводнили этот мир в таком количестве, что он вот-вот лопнет по швам. 
Но, несмотря на все это, во время подобной эпохи выросла величественная ива, способная безгранично развиваться и эволюционировать. 
Плоды, что растут на ней, способны даровать другим необычайные способности, а духовная энергия, которую она распространяет, укрепляет силы зверей, что обитают на ее территории. 
… 
Одни величают ее мировым древом – Иггдрасилем, день за днем восславляя его существование! 
Другие – «великим божественным древом», подпирающим небосвод! 
Разумеется, большинство просто зовут его «священным древом», или «проклятым деревом», или же «дьявольским деревом»… Да и еще много как. 
И все же, при любом его упоминании в голосе каждого ясно слышится благоговейный трепет.
description.zh: 黑鸟社新作，重生成为一株柳树！？灵气复苏，万物崛起。重生的柳树也走上了进化之路。能够无限进化的它，是“神力”还是“诅咒”？

Uho-yeong had dreamed of becoming a soccer player. However, he was not blessed with the talent and died without realizing his dream, struck by lightning. It was then that the demon Mammon appeared, offering the ability to covet everyone's talents...

title.en: Akuninzura Shita B-kyuu Boukensha: Shujinkou to Sono Osananajimi-tachi no Papa ni Naru

altTitles.ja: 悪人面したＢ級冒険者 主人公とその幼馴染たちのパパになる

altTitles.ja-ro: Akunindzura Shita B-kyuu Boukensha - Shujinkou to Sono Osananajimi-tachi no Papa ni Naru

altTitles.ja: B-Grade Adventurer With a Bad Guy Face Becomes a Daddy to the Hero and His Fellow Children

altTitles.en: A B-Rank Adventurer With an Evil Face Becomes a Father for the Hero and His Childhood Friends

description.en:
Gray, a B-rank adventurer, was supposed to be just a mob character in the RPG *Bright Fantasy*. However, by chance, he saved an orphan who was attacked by thugs on the roadside and decided to raise him as his father. But the orphan turned out to be the protagonist of this world, “Isuka”!

This choice would greatly change the fate of the world.
___
**Note:** While even the English on the Japanese covers gets this wrong, the orphan saved is the *protagonist*, not the *hero*.
description.pt-br: Gray, um aventureiro de nível B, deveria ser apenas um personagem da máfia no RPG “Bright Fantasy”. Porém, por acaso, ele salvou um órfão que foi atacado por bandidos na beira da estrada e decidiu criá-lo como pai. Mas o órfão acabou por ser o herói deste mundo, “Iska”. Essa escolha mudaria muito o destino do mundo.

altTitles.en: The Servant Is the Demon King?!

altTitles.vi: Đại Quản Gia Là Ma Hoàng

description.en:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um imperador mágico e o homem mais forte vivo, ele é traido pelo seu subordinado e é morto, após isso ele reencarna em um menino sem cultivo e começa a trilhar seu caminho para a vingança.

title.en: The Count’s Youngest Son Is a Gamer

altTitles.en: The Count’s Youngest Son Is a Player

description.en: Dohyeon is a top-ranking gamer in Connect, an immersive VR game that is overrun by corrupt guilds. After being murdered for discovering a mythical item, he wakes up as Lord Raul Ashton, an NPC in a closed beta version of Connect. Now the sole player in this realm, he decides to use his knowledge from his past life to prevent the downfall of House Ashton and unlock unprecedented powers. For Dohyeon, Connect is no longer just a game—it’s now his reality. Join him as he embarks on a thrilling quest to reshape his fate!

Living by selling information about monsters, Maeng Siwoo is considered completely useless in the hunter industry without any standout qualities. However, he fiercely battles to provide for his sick younger sibling.

One fateful day, he is gifted a mysterious smartphone by a transcendent being within a dungeon, appointing him as the channel manager for such beings. Upon subscribing to the channel, he unlocks the ability to wield the powers of the gods.
description.pt-br:
Vivendo da venda de informações sobre monstros, Maeng Siwoo é considerado completamente inútil na indústria de caçadores, sem quaisquer qualidades de destaque. No entanto, ele luta ferozmente para sustentar seu irmão mais novo doente.

Um dia fatídico, ele recebe um misterioso smartphone de um ser transcendente dentro de uma masmorra, nomeando-o como gerente de canal de tais seres. Ao se inscrever no canal, ele desbloqueia a habilidade de exercer os poderes dos deuses.

title.en: Peaceful Camping Life in Another World

altTitles.es-la: Acampando en otro Mundo: buscandole el sazon a la vida

altTitles.en: Healing Life Through Camping In Another World

description.en: Star chef Ganghyeon Lee, who has lost his sense of taste, retreats to a peaceful countryside to escape the public eye. In his grandfather's rural home, he stumbles upon a portal to another world. Taking advantage of his escape, he decides to enjoy a relaxed camping life in this new world. However, the inhabitants of this world keep showing interest in him. Will Ganghyeon be able to live a peaceful life?

title.en: Ryoushin no Shakkin wo Katagawari shite morau Jouken wa Nihon Ichi Kawaii Joshikousei to Issho ni Kurasu koto deshita.

altTitles.ja: 両親の借金を肩代わりしてもらう条件は日本一可愛い女子高生と一緒に暮らすことでした。

altTitles.en: I'm Gonna Live with You Not Because My Parents Left Me Their Debt But Because I Like You

altTitles.zh: 替我父母偿还债务的条件是与日本最可爱的女高中生同居。

altTitles.zh-ro: Tì wǒ fùmǔ chánghuán zhàiwù de tiáojiàn shì yǔ rìběn zuì kě'ài de nǚ gāozhōng shēng tóngjū.

description.en:
The main character, Yoshizumi Yuya, was being pressured into paying off the debt left by his parents who had fled abroad. It was his classmate, Hitotsuba Kaede, chosen as the cutest schoolgirl in Japan, who saved him from this crisis of life and death. However, there was a catch. The condition required to fulfill in return for taking over his debt was — “In return for the loan, you have – to live with me.”

“Why did that happen?!”

Yuya’s daily life collapsed on this day.

“Yuya-kun. Let’s take a bath together.”

“Yuya-kun, please be my hug pillow.”

“That’s enough, Hitotsuba-san!”

The slapstick love comedy between the beautiful, but easy-going Hitotsuba Kaede and the serious and hard-headed Yoshizumi Yuya, starts now!
description.id: Tokoh utama, Yoshizumi Yuya, dipaksa untuk melunasi hutang yang ditinggalkan oleh orang tuanya yang melarikan diri ke luar negeri. Itu adalah teman sekelasnya, Hitotsuba Kaede, terpilih sebagai siswi terimut di Jepang, yang menyelamatkannya dari krisis hidup dan mati ini. Namun, ada motif tersembunyi di balik itu. Syarat yang harus dipenuhi sebagai imbalan untuk melunasi utangnya adalah — “Sebagai imbalan atas pinjaman itu, kau harus tinggal bersamaku.” “Kenapa jadi begitu?!” Kehidupan sehari-hari Yuya runtuh pada hari ini. “Yuya-kun. Ayo mandi bersama.” “Yuya-kun, jadilah bantal pelukku.” “Cukup, Hitotsuba-san!” Kisah cinta komedi romantis yang menggugah antara Hitotsuba Kaede yang cantik namun santai dan Yoshizumi Yuya yang serius dan keras kepala, dimulai sekarang!
description.ja:
第1巻の内容紹介: 糖度300％の同棲ラブコメ
両親が借金3000万を残して海外逃亡…！？追い詰められた吉住勇也の前に、不意に現れたのは社長令嬢の同級生・一葉楓。勇也も密かに憧れていた日本一可愛い女子高生1位に選ばれた楓は、彼女は意外な提案をするが

Dai 1-kan no naiyō shōkai: Tōdo 300-pāsento no dōsei rabu kome ryōshin ga shakkin 3000 man o nokoshite kaigai tōbō…!? Oitsumerareta Yoshizumi Yūya no mae ni, fui ni arawareta no wa shachō reijō no dōkyūsei 一葉楓. Yūya mo hisoka ni akogarete ita nihon'ichi kawaii mesukōsei 1-i ni eraba reta kaede wa, kanojo wa igaina teian o suruga.

description.ar:
هنا ، داخل رواية فنون الدفاع عن النفس هذه ، يوجد معلم حقيقي يعلم البطل المتعجرف وينقذه من الموت.
 وسيم وطيب وصالح وقوي و ...
 على أي حال ، كان هناك عيب كبير في معلم البطل وهو ابنته الوحيدة الحمقاء المليئة بالجشع... كانت شريرة اضافية ، كانت تطارد البطل دوما ولكنه لم يستطع التخلي عنها لانها ابنه معلمه.
 خلال قراءة الرواية ، قمت بلعن تلك الابنة وقلت أنه لو كنت أنا ، فلن أعيش هكذا.
 "لكن هذا لا يعني أنني أريد أن أكون هي!"
 ما هو أسوأ ان أبي مات بالفعل ، وسمعتي هي الأسوأ.
 هربت حتما ، لكن ... مت، لكن عندما فتحت عيني كان أبي حياً؟!
 "إذا كان الأمر كذلك ، في هذه الحياة ، سانقذ أبي بالتأكيد!"
 لكن…
 "أعتقد أنهم يستهدفون حفيدتي !؟ سأقتلهم جميعًا! "
 لماذا أرى جدي ، الذي لم يظهر سوى مرات قليلة في الرواية يتصرف هكذا؟
 "زواج؟ لا ، قالت يوني إنها ستعيش بجانبي لبقية حياتها ".
 حتى أبي ، بطريقة ما أصبح غريبًا.
 علاوة على ذلك،
 "لماذا تستمر في تفاديني؟ هل هذا خطأي أيضًا؟ "
 أليست الشخصية الرئيسية فجأة مهووسة بي؟
 في الأصل ، كان مقدرا لي أن أموت حتى أتيت إلى هنا ".
 لقد أنقذت ذلك الوغد ، لكن اليس العمل الصالح دوما يمر دون عقاب؟
 "على الأقل عندما أكون أمامك ... لا أعتقد أنني شخص رائع."
 الشرير الذي قطع عنقي يحاول فجأة التوبة.
 هل من المقبول حقًا أن يصبح الأمر هكذا؟

---
[Original Web Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/56272329)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B4%EB%A6%BC%EC%84%B8%EA%B0%80-%EC%B2%9C%EB%8C%80%EB%B0%9B%EB%8A%94-%EC%86%90%EB%85%80-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EC%97%88%EB%8B%A4/3263), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61001975)

**Official Translations:**

* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Despised-Granddaughter-of-the-Murim-Clan/668)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/139454)
description.en:
Yeon was just an orphan on the streets when a man claiming to be her father brought her to his family home. But the Baengri estate was a den of vipers that swallowed her whole, and it's only when she's standing at the funeral of the father she never truly understood that she realizes how familiar this story is. When she wakes up six years old again, Yeon knows she can't waste her second chance. This time, she's going to save her father. This time, she's going to live without regrets.

---
Here, inside this martial arts novel, there is a true teacher who teaches the arrogant male lead and awakens him through death. Handsome, good-natured, righteous, strong, and… Anyway, there was one big flaw in the male lead's damn fine teacher. It was his foolish only daughter who was filled with greed. A tenacious villainous extra, who always comes back to haunt the male lead in every way, but cannot be abandoned because she is his teacher's daughter. Throughout reading the novel, I cursed at that daughter. Saying that if it were me, I wouldn't live like that.

'But that didn't mean that I wanted to be her!'

What was worse, Father has already died, and my reputation was the worst. Inevitably, I ran away, but… I died. However, when I opened my eyes, Father was alive?!

'If so, in this life, I will definitely save Father!'

However…

"To think they’re aiming for my granddaughter?! I'll kill them all!"

Why do I see Grandfather, who doesn't even appear many times throughout the novel, so often like this?

"Marriage? No. Yeonie said that she would live by my side for the rest of her life."

Even Father, somehow became weird. Moreover:

"Why do you keep avoiding me? Is this also my mistake?"

Isn't the main character suddenly becoming obsessed with me?

"Originally, I was destined to die. Until you came here."

I saved the time-limited bastard, but isn’t it that no good deed goes unpunished?

"At least when I'm in front of you… I don't think I’m trash."

The villain who blew off my neck is suddenly trying to repent.

Is it really okay if it's like this?

---

description.es:
¡La protagonista transmigró a un mundo de una novela de artes marciales! La protagonista transmigra al cuerpo de Baeklee Yeon, la tonta y detestable hija de Baeklee Ee-Gang, un ser perfecto y el maestro del protagonista masculino, quien lo guía hacia el camino de un héroe. Ella fue asesinada inesperadamente, pero cuando abrió los ojos descubrió que había regresado a su infancia donde podría enmendar todos sus errores. “¿Podré ser amada esta vez?” En esta vida, con la determinación de convertirse en la hija perfecta, en lugar de un fastidio, ella pasa de ser la nieta despreciada a la nieta amada de la familia Baeklee. “¡¿Crees que lo vales?!” “¡Sí!” Incapaz de ocultar su confusión ante el vigor de su ambiciosa nieta… “Si hay incluso una pequeña esperanza, ¿Cómo puedo, como padre, rendirme?” “…Es como hablarle a la pared.” Su abuelo secretamente abre su corazón después de ser arrollado por el dúo de atractivos padre e hija, resueltos a salvar a la incapacitada hija que no puede practicar artes marciales, aunque eso significara recibir su odio. ¡Y justo cuando su vida merecía ser vivida, ¿la obsesión de los candidatos a protagonistas masculinos hacia ella, empezó de repente?! ¡Yeon, sólo caminemos por el sendero de flores de ahora en adelante!

---
Aquí, dentro de esta novela de artes marciales, hay un verdadero maestro que enseña al arrogante protagonista masculino y lo despierta a través de la muerte. Guapo, bondadoso, recto, fuerte y... De todos modos, había un gran defecto en el excelente profesor del protagonista masculino. Era su tonta única hija la que estaba llena de codicia. Una villana extra tenaz, que siempre regresa para perseguir al protagonista masculino en todos los sentidos, pero no puede ser abandonada porque es la hija de su maestro. Mientras leía la novela, maldije a esa hija. Diciendo que si fuera yo, no viviría así. '¡Pero eso no significaba que yo quisiera ser ella!' Lo que era peor, Padre ya murió, y mi reputación es la peor. Inevitablemente, me escapé, pero... morí. Sin embargo, cuando abrí los ojos, ¿¡Padre estaba vivo!? '¡Si es así, en esta vida, definitivamente salvaré a Padre!' Sin embargo… “¿¡Pensar que están apuntando a mi nieta!? ¡Los mataré a todos!” ¿Por qué veo al abuelo, que ni siquiera aparece muchas veces a lo largo de la novela, tan a menudo así? "¿Casamiento? No. Yeonie dijo que viviría a mi lado por el resto de su vida”. Incluso Padre, de alguna manera se volvió raro. Además, “¿Por qué sigues evitándome? ¿Es este también mi error? ¿No se está obsesionando el personaje principal de repente conmigo? “Originalmente, estaba destinado a morir. Hasta que llegaste aquí. Salvé al bastardo de tiempo limitado, pero ¿no es que ninguna buena acción queda sin castigo? "Al menos cuando estoy frente a ti... no creo que sea una basura". El villano que me voló el cuello de repente está tratando de arrepentirse. ¿Está realmente bien si es así?

---

description.fr:
Dans ce roman d'arts martiaux, il y a un professeur qui enseigne à l’arrogant protagoniste et le sauve de la mort. Une belle apparence, intelligent, fort… Quoi qu'il en soit, ce professeur avait un point faible. Il s'agit de sa fille unique, stupide et remplie de cupidité. Une antagoniste tenace, qui ne fait qu’embêter le rôle principal masculin de toutes sortes de manières, mais ne peut être abandonnée car elle est la fille de son professeur. Tout au long de la lecture du roman, j'ai maudit cette fille. Dire que si c'était moi, je ne vivrais pas comme ça.

«Mais ça ne voulait pas dire que je voulais être elle!»

Et le pire arriva, la mort de mon père. Évidemment, je me suis enfuie, mais… J'ai été assassinée. Puis, quand j'ai ouvert les yeux, Père était en vie?!

«Cette fois-ci, dans cette vie, je sauverai père!»

Cependant…

«Comment osent-ils s'en prendre à ma petite-fille?! Je vais tous les tuer!»

Pourquoi est-ce que je croise grand-père, qui n'apparaît pas souvent dans le roman, aussi fréquemment?

«Un mariage? Non. Yeonie a dit qu'elle vivrait à mes côtés pour le restant de sa vie.»

Même Père, d'une manière ou d'une autre, est devenu bizarre.

De plus, «Pourquoi continuez-vous à m'éviter? Ai-je fait une erreur?»

Le personnage principal n'est-il pas soudainement en train de devenir obsédé par moi?

«À l'origine, j'étais destiné à mourir. Jusqu'à ce que tu viennes ici.»

J'ai sauvé ce bâtard limité dans le temps, mais n'est-ce pas qu'aucune bonne action ne reste impunie?

«Au moins quand je suis devant toi… je ne me sens pas comme une ordure.»

Le méchant qui m'a tuée essaie soudainement de se repentir.

Est-ce une bonne chose?

---

description.ru:
Здесь, внутри этого романа о боевых искусствах, есть учитель, который учит надменного мужского героя и пробуждает его силу. Красивый, добродушный, праведный, сильный и… К сожалению, у чертовски прекрасного учителя главного героя был один большой недостаток. Это была его глупая дочь, вдоволь наполненная жадностью. Стойкая статистка-злодейка, которая всегда возвращается, чтобы преследовать главного героя, но ее нельзя бросить, потому что она дочь учителя. На протяжении всего романа я проклинала эту дочь. Сказать честно, что если бы этой дочерью была я, то не допустила бы подобного. 

—Но это не значит, что я хотела быть ею!

Что еще хуже, отец уже умер, а моя репутация была ужасной. 

Я сбежала, но… я умерла. Однако, когда я открыл глаза, отец все ещё был жив!?

«Если так, то в этой жизни я обязательно спасу отца!»

Однако…

—Подумать только, они целятся в мою внучку!? Я убью их всех!

Почему я так часто вижу дедушку, который появлялся в романе от силы пару раз? 

—Брак? Нет. Ёни сказала, что будет жить рядом со мной до конца своей жизни. 

Даже отец стал вести себя как-то странно.

Более того:
—Почему ты продолжаешь меня избегать? Это тоже моя ошибка?

Почему главной герой внезапно стал так одержим мной? 

—До твоего прихода мне было суждено умереть

Я спасла временного ублюдка, но ведь ни одно доброе дело не остается безнаказанным?

—По крайней мере, когда я стою перед тобой…

Злодей, снесший мне шею, вдруг пытается раскаяться.

Все будет хорошо, так ведь?

---

description.tr:
Ana karakter; dövüş sanatları dünyasında başrolü, hikâyenin kahramanı yapacak olan güçlü ve eğitimini tamamlamış usta Baek Lee Ee-Gang’ın aptal ve sinir bozucu kızı Baek Lee Yeon olarak hayat bulur. Yeon, beklenmedik şekilde öldürülür ve gözlerini açtığında her şeyi geri alabileceği çocukluk günlerine geri döner. “Bu hayatımda ailem beni sevecek mi?” Baş belası olmak yerine harika bir evlat olmaya karar veren Yeon, Baek Lee ailesinin saygın torunu olarak hayatına başlar. Bu hayatını güzelce yaşamak ister ancak ailenin başı olan büyükbabası Baek Lee Pan-Hyuk da dahil olmak üzere herkes Yeon’a engel olur. Büyükbabasının bakışları o kadar serttir ki dağları ve nehirleri bile titretebilir. “O kadar değerli olduğunu mu sanıyorsun?”
“Evet.”
Büyükbaba, kendine güvenen torunu karşısında şaşkına döner ve oğluyla torununu gizlice izlemeye başlar.
“Çok az umut olsa da baba olarak nasıl hemen pes edebilirsin?”
“Amma inatçısın he.”
Yakışıklı oğlu, dövüş sanatları dünyasının yüz karası kızını o karanlıktan kurtarmaya ve herkesi karşısına almaya hazırdır. Yeon, tam hayatının artık daha güzel olacağını düşünürken erkek başroller bir bir ona takıntılı olmaya başlar!
“Yeonie’m, bu sefer hayatımız gerçekten çok güzel olacak!!”

description.vi:
Cô xuyên không trở thành một nhân vật chính trong thế giới võ lâm. Cô trở thành BaekRi Yeon, đứa con gái ngốc nghếch và quậy phá của BaekRi Eui Kang, một người thầy chân chính và là người đã dẫn dắt nhân vật nam chính trở thành một anh hùng. Sau khi bất ngờ bị giết, cô mở mắt ra và trở thành một đứa trẻ có thể làm đảo ngược mọi thứ. ‘Mình, lần này có thể nhận được sự yêu thương không?” Ở kiếp này, cô có niềm tin rằng mình sẽ trở thành con gái được yêu thương chứ không phải đứa con gái chịu nhiều tổn thương nữa, cô bắt đầu cuộc sống được mọi người kính trọng từ cháu gái của gia đình Baekri. Những gia tộc cản trở xuất hiện trước mặt Yeon, người chỉ muốn đi trên con đường rải đẩy hoa, và Baek Ri Pae-hyeok, là tộc trưởng và cũng là ông nội của cô, ông sở hữu khí phách của một vị vua, người có thể khiến cả núi sông và cây cối rung chuyển chỉ bằng một ánh mắt. “Ngươi cho rằng ngươi đáng giá như thế sao!” “Vâng!” Ông không thể che giấu sự hốt hoảng trước khí thế mạnh mẽ của cháu gái “Nếu còn một tia hy vọng mong manh, người làm cha sao con có thể từ bỏ?” “…Như là một đứa trẻ cứng đầu.” Ông lão bắt đầu mềm lòng vì hai cha con tuyệt mỹ đánh bại với quyết tâm sẽ cứu đứa cháu gái không có tài nghệ võ công … Tôi nghĩ rằng được sống ở thời điểm này là xứng đáng, nhưng nỗi ám ảnh của các ứng cử viên nam chính đột nhiên bắt đầu? Yeoni của chúng ta, bây giờ hãy chỉ đi trên con đường hoa thôi nhé!

---

description.pt-br:
Aqui, dentro desta novel de artes marciais, há um professor que ensina o protagonista arrogante e o desperta através de sua morte. Bonito, agradável, justo, forte e… enfim, só havia uma grande falha no professor do protagonista, que era sua filha única insensata, a qual era cheia de ambição. Uma persistente vilã extra que sempre assombra o protagonista de todas as formas, mas nunca pode ser abandonada por ser a filha do professor. Enquanto eu lia o romance, amaldiçoei-a, dizendo que, se eu fosse ela, não viveria daquela forma. Mas isso não significava que eu queria ser ela! Pior ainda, o pai já havia morrido e minha reputação era a pior. Inevitavelmente, eu fugi, mas… morri. No entanto, quando abri meus olhos, meu pai estava vivo?! “Já que é assim, nesta vida, vou definitivamente salvar meu pai! Entretanto… “Eles estão visando minha neta?! Vou matar todos eles” Por que vejo o meu avô, que sequer aparece muitas vezes na novel, com tanta frequência assim? “Casamento? Não. Yeon disse que viveria ao meu lado pelo resto da vida dela.” Mesmo meu pai se tornou estranho. Além disso, “Por que você continua me evitando? Cometi algum erro?”, o protagonista por um acaso está se tornando obcecado por mim? “Originalmente, eu estava destinado à morte. Até você chegar aqui.” Eu salvei o idiota que tinha os dias contados, mas não dizem que somos recompensados por nossas boas ações? “Pelo menos, quando estou à sua frente… não penso que sou um lix@.” De repente, o vilão responsável por minha morte está parecendo arrependido. Está mesmo tudo bem que as coisas sejam assim?

---

Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

altTitles.ru: Младший сын семьи Пэн из Хэбэя

description.en:
Habuk Peng Family’s best strength, Peng Jihyuk heads to the Nakho Region to save his family that fell into destruction due to the attack of the Demon Sect, but everything was a trap. At the moment of death, he felt the wrath of being the only one left from his beloved family.

‘Again…if you give me a chance…!”

Peng Jihyuk, who thought he was dead, woke up in the body of Young Master Sa, of the Peng Family.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)
description.ko:
하북팽가 최고의 전력, 도왕 팽지혁. 마교의 습격으로 멸문지화에 빠진 가문을 구하러 낙호곡으로 향하지만 모든 것은 함정이었고, 죽음의 순간 자신이 사랑했던 가문에게 버림받았다는 사실에 분노한다.
'다시... 내게 한 번만 더 기회가 주어진다면...!'
죽은 줄 알았던 팽지혁은 방구석 둔재, 하북팽가 사공자의 몸에서 눈을 뜬다.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)
description.ru:
Пэн Джи Хёк — лучший воин семейства Пэн из Хэбэя. Из-за атаки Магё его семейство почти исчезло... Для её спасения он отправляется в дальнее путешествие, во время которого попадает в ловушку. За мгновение до смерти он узнал, что его горячо любимая семья от него отказалась, и пришёл в ярость.
«Если бы у меня был ещё один шанс!..»
Он уже был готов к встрече со смертью, но когда открыл глаза — оказался в теле молодого господина.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)
description.zh:
一代刀王重生废柴四公子！
为报恩逆袭勇斗魔教！
名门彭家的最强战斗力，刀王彭枝奕。为了拯救因魔教的袭击而陷入灭门之灾的彭家，彭枝奕前往落虎谷与魔教教主决战，却发现这一切都是个陷阱。临死之前得知自己被深爱的家族抛弃的彭枝奕愤怒不已。彭枝奕原以为自己死了，没想到却在彭家四公子的身体里重新醒了过来。

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)

description.en:
300 years ago, the invincible warrior Hyeon-oh Kim brought down the Tower of the End, preventing the world’s demise. Though he should have died the moment the Tower of the End collapsed, Hyeon-oh is reborn 300 years later in the body of a 17-year-old boy named Juhyeok Kim.

Meanwhile, he discovers the existence of the Constellations, who were once his disciples 300 years ago but were born during the time when he did not exist in this world. Will he be able to find them again and train them?

altTitles.ja: キン肉マン

description.en:
Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
description.pt-br:
Kinnikuman (Homem Músculo), um super-herói fraco e desajeitado, constantemente entrando em situações malucas. À medida que a série avançava, a história começou a mudar de comédia para ação, enquanto Kinnikuman lutava contra inimigos cada vez mais fortes no ringue de luta livre. A série continuamente introduziu novos personagens Super Humanos, conhecidos como Chojin, que desafiariam Kinnikuman e seus amigos para vários propósitos. 

A serialização original foi de 1979-1986 e terminou com o Vol. 36. A série continuou diretamente em 2010. 

Ganhou o Shogakukan Manga Awards por melhor Shounen em 1985.

description.en:
Cheoldu, a barbarian raised on Earth, lives a mundane life with his best friend Jintae.

But when he sees an alien creature from his planet on the news, everything changes. Thrown into an apocalyptic challenge, Cheoldu and Jintae must adjust their lives in Nova, a savage world filled with goblins and ogres. 

Will the two conquer Nova’s perils and uncover the secrets that could change Earth’s fate? An epic tale of friendship, survival, and untamed adventure awaits.
description.ko:
K고딩 강철두는 평화로운 지구가 따분하다. 이유는 그에게 ‘바바리안’의 피가 흐르기 때문!

전투를 갈망하던 그때, 지구에 종말이 선포되고살기 위해선 야만의 세계 ‘노바 행성’으로 이주해야 한다!

철두의 심장이 뛴다.전투와 모험이 가득한, K-바바리안의 노빠꾸 행성 정복기!

altTitles.en: Han Dae Sung Returned From Hell

description.en:
On the way home from the third year of middle school. Han Dae-sung falls into hell without any context.

At first, he wandered in hell for about a few days and despaired, but he said that he had to live. He starts fighting with the determination to return to Earth. Hell was like a game. A UI pop-up window like an RPG game appears in front of your eyes as a hologram, there is a status window, and you learn skills and acquire items. Even though he almost lost his life several times from the ferocious beasts of hell, he persisted and continued to grow. 

10 years passed, 50 years passed, and 80 years were taken. He finally defeats the demon, the absolute lord of hell, and ascends to a new seat of power. 

[Would you like to return to Earth?] until the message pops up. Hell is worthless. Daesung returns to Earth, feeling no need to stay in this place where there is only a desolate land covered in flames and magical beasts who cannot communicate. 

And when he wakes up in a hospital in Seoul, he realizes that only 10 years have passed since he fell to hell. Daesung, who was in a vegetative state on Earth for 10 years, receives rehabilitation treatment. 

At that time, a message that could only be seen in hell appears in front of his eyes. [The advent quest has arrived.] He accepts the system provided by hell and completes his rehabilitation training at an explosive pace while carrying out his mission. 

While hospitalized in his hospital room, Hell gave him quests relentlessly. Daesung's skinny body recovers the body of those days, which was solidified by living in hell for 80 years. Let Daeseong finish his descent. The system of Hell invites them to the other side of the world called 'Pantheon'.

 'Pantheon' Based on the diary Daeseong wrote in his selfishness, the time and space of hell are recreated. Demonic beasts imprisoned in all the English spaces of Pandaemonium beg Daesung, the absolute, to save them. However, with the cold-hearted reply, "Fuck Daesung". He himself declares that he will not fight anymore and will live normally. 

However, the hometown Earth, which should be peaceful, was in a state of air raids by beings from another alien dimension, and the 'great upheaval' began on the day Daesung fell into hell. Since then, in the earth of cataclysm, in order to counteract the monsters that have entered the earth, a monster-specialized monster extermination certificate called 'Hunter' has been created. 

Daesung, who promised to live a normal life without fighting, makes one decision. home just returned. To protect the barely reunited family, the enemies from that extraterrestrial dimension must be exterminated. 

Having made up his mind to become a hunter, he goes back and forth to the Pantheon and unlocks the powers of hell one by one. and your own world. He shows the real 'hell' as the absolute of hell to all who threaten his precious people.

description.en:
Touya, the strongest player in the game Pandemic World Online, had won so many items that he decided to create an alternate account to store the extra ones. While playing this very game in his second account, he was summoned to another world as a character he made, where the people were merrily expecting a hero. However, when it is known that he doesn't have the title of a hero, he is discarded and replaced by another person. Now, he must survive in an another world with the account he merely used to store his extra items in.  


---
description.es-la:
Touya, el jugador mas fuerte del juego Pandemic World Online, ha ganado tantos items que decidió crear una cuenta alternativa para almacenarlos, mientras jugaba fue invocado a otro mundo, pero al no tener la categoría de héroe es desechado y remplazado por otra persona, ahora tendrá que sobrevivir solo en ese mundo y con el personaje que creó para almacenar esos objetos.  


---

description.en:
A Spinoff of <Castle 2: Pinnacle> - An action drama featuring Saroka 'Seo Jintae'!

Jintae becomes a killer after being saved by a man when he was at life's lowest point. While searching for his long-lost sister, he discovers that his younger sister is in Hong Kong and deeply involved with the Triad, Hong Kong's largest criminal organization. Thus begins Jintae's journey as he confronts the Triad in the nighttime streets of Hong Kong while searching for his sister.
description.ko:
<캐슬2:만인지상> 사로카 '서진태'의 액션활극!
삶의 끝자락에서 한 남자에게 구원을 받고 킬러가 된 서진태.
어렸을 적 헤어진 동생을 찾기 위해 수소문하던 중 동생이 홍콩에 있다는 것과
홍콩 최대의 범죄조직 삼합회와 깊게 관련되어 있다는 사실을 알게 된다.
그렇게 서진태는 밤의 도시 홍콩에서 삼합회와 맞서며 동생을 찾아 나서는데...

Voice Phishing Turns Your Life Around

description.en:
The person who is ranked No.1 in the world rankings of the AOS League of Infinity game and the strongest person who is nicknamed the devil on the battlefield.
However, a man wearing a golden mask appeared before the strongest person who had suffered a setback in a traffic accident and was abandoned by everyone and proposed.
“If I come back, can I become a world championship winner?”
The strongest person who goes back to the past becomes the maestro who leads the battlefield between earth and other worlds and shows the best game of all time.
description.id:
Orang yang merupakan peringkat No. 1 di peringkat dunia game AOS League of Infinity dan orang terkuat yang dijuluki iblis di medan perang.
Namun, seorang pria bertopeng emas muncul di hadapan orang terkuat yang mengalami kemerosotan dalam kecelakaan lalu lintas dan ditinggalkan oleh semua orang dan mengajukan lamaran.
“Jika saya kembali, bisakah saya menjadi pemenang kejuaraan dunia?”
Orang terkuat yang kembali ke masa lalu menjadi maestro yang memimpin medan perang antara bumi dan dunia lain dan menunjukkan permainan terbaik sepanjang masa.

altTitles.en: Embodiment of the Assassin in the Murim World

description.en:
The No.1 Hitman, Kim Gun, finds himself plunged into the world of martial arts due to a mysterious accident. To return to his original world, he must complete a mission called 'Martial Arts Conquest.'

With a total of 2 guns, Kim Gun's adventure to subdue the unfamiliar martial arts world begins.
description.ko:
No.1 킬러 김건은 의문의 사고로 무림 세계에 빠지게 되고
원래 있던 지구로 돌아가기 위해서는 '무림 제패'라는 임무를 완수해야 한다는 것을 알게 된다.

총 2자루와 함께 낯선 무림이란 세계를 평정하기 위한 김건의 모험이 시작된다.

altTitles.ja: アーク〜フリーター人生に終止符を〜

description.en:
Hyunwoo, an unemployed part-timer worker, is struggling with his everyday life. With his only strong suit being gaming, he struggles to be employed and getting a job at a major company seems like a dream that'll never come true.

However, one day he receives an opportunity to turn his life around! A job interview at the largest virtual reality game developer ever, Global Exus, is through a game?! With his father's absence since childhood, his ill mother, and their severe poverty; this seems like an opportunity of of a lifetime.

Armed only with his tough nature, Hyunwoo enters <New World> and begins his conquest!

Хён Ву - обычный безработный, прожигающий свою жизнь в видеоиграх. Из-за того, что его единственная сильная сторона это игры, он  мечтает устроиться на работу в крупную компанию. Ему кажется, что эта мечта несбыточная, однако он всё же получает шанс изменить свою жизнь. Собеседование в "Global Exus" пройдёт в виде экзамена в игре?! У него с детства не было отца, сейчас его мать тяжело больна, и они на грани бедности, это возможность изменить всю его жизнь. Вооружённый лишь своей жёсткой натурой, Хён Ву приходит в "Новый Мир", чтобы завоевать его!

title.en: A Blank Slate Regression for the Idol That Lost His Original Mindset

altTitles.ko: 초심 잃은 아이돌을 위한 회귀 백서

description.en:
‘I want to do real music now instead of these fxxking idol songs.’

Yoon Eden, an idol in his 8th year, was tired of working with his shitty agency so he worked on the side as a composer.
He succeeded in music composition and bought a house in Cheongdam-dong, but has become an arrogant celebrity.

[Your 30,000th fan is disappointed in you.]
[Starting a project to help idols regain their lost, original intentions!]

But what the hell? He was sent to his debut days when his group was at its lowest to find his original intentions-

[The conditions have been met.]
[You have disappointed 30 thousand fans, now make 30 million fans happy!]

There’s even a mission that's only possible to complete for 1st tier idols?!

“Fuck, my Cheongdam-dong house! My billion-dollar royalties! My Ferrari!”

[Profanity detected.] [Original Intent -2]

[When Original Intent falls to 0, you start over again!]

Even in these harsh conditions that threaten infinite regression, will the project help this idol find his lost, original intentions?
description.ko:
‘이제는 아이돌 노래 말고 real music을 하고 싶다.’

똥망 소속사에 지쳐 작곡 부업을 뛰던 8년 차 아이돌 윤이든.
청담동 내집마련엔 성공했지만, 예술병이 세게 찾아왔다?

[3만 번째 팬이 당신에게 실망했습니다.]
[초심 잃은 아이돌을 위한 초심 되찾기 프로젝트를 시작합니다!]

그런데 웬걸. 팀 탈퇴를 앞둔 그에게 초심을 찾으라며
망돌이었던 데뷔 초 시절로 보내진 것도 모자라-

[프로젝트의 완결을 위해서는 필수 조건을 충족해야 합니다.]
[3만 명의 팬들을 실망시킨 당신, 3천만 명의 팬들을 기쁘게 만들어라!]

1군 아이돌로 성공해야 하는 미션까지 주어지는데?!

“X발, 내 청담동 집! 내 억대 저작권료! 내 페라리!”

[비속어가 감지되었습니다.] [초심도 -2]
[※초심도가 0이 되면 다시 시작합니다!]

심지어 실패하면 무한 회귀가 기다리고 있는 극악의 조건 속
초심 잃은 아이돌의 초심 되찾기 프로젝트는 무사히 성공할 수 있을까?

description.en:
Na Hwa-Jin’s teaching techniques are pretty violent for someone who works in the Ministry of Education.

That being said, when punishments don't seem to work on even the worst of school bullies, there is no better man for the job.

Sometimes you can’t get a good education until those bullies are taught a lesson.

Учні вчинили масовий переворот, змінивши шкільний устрій, а працівники учбових закладів втратити свій авторитет. На Хваджін, член Бюро захисту освіти, починає «реальну освіту», щоб встановити порядок.
description.pt-br: As técnicas de ensino de Hwajin Na são bastante violentas para quem trabalha no Ministério da Educação. Dito isso, quando as punições não parecem funcionar nem mesmo com o pior dos valentões da escola, não há homem melhor para o trabalho. Às vezes, você não pode obter uma boa educação até que esses valentões aprendam uma lição.

description.en:
Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others.

Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.
description.es: Hitohito Tadano acaba de empezar la secundaria alta anhelando que sea pura paz y tranquilidad, pero sus planes se truncan cuando termina sentado al lado de la perfecta Shoko Komi. Ella es linda, inteligente, educada y hasta huele bien. Pero tiene 0 dotes sociales y no sabe cómo corno comunicarse con los demás. Es ahí que Tadano se sube al pony y se propone ayudarla a su compañera hasta que se haga de cien amigos, y con suerte algo más.
description.pl: Komi-san jest piękną i godną podziwu dziewczyną, od której nikt nie może oderwać oczu. Prawie cała szkoła postrzega ją jako zimne piękno, które jest poza ich zasięgiem, ale Tadano Hitohito zna prawdę: młoda piękność po prostu źle komunikuje się z innymi. Komi-san, chce to zmienić, a ma jej w tym pomóc Tadano.
description.es-la: El viaje a 100 amigos comienza con una sola conversación. El mayor sueño de la estudiante de secundaria socialmente ansiosa Shouko Komi es hacer amigos, ¡pero todos en la escuela confunden su ansiedad social paralizante con una reserva fría! Con todo el cuerpo estudiantil manteniendo su distancia y Komi incapaz de pronunciar una sola palabra, la amistad podría estar siempre fuera de su alcance. Tadano Hitohito es un chico ordinario total, y así es como le gusta. Vive para mezclarse con el fondo. Todo eso cambia cuando se encuentra solo en un salón de clases el primer día de la escuela secundaria con la legendaria Komi. Rápidamente se da cuenta de que ella no es distante, sino que tiene problemas para comunicarse con los demás. ¡Ahora ha hecho su misión ayudarla en su búsqueda para hacer 100 amigos!
description.pt-br: Komi-san é uma bela e admirável garota que ninguém consegue tirar os olhos. Quase todos da escola a veem como alguém fora do alcance, mas Tadano Shigeo sabe a verdade: **ela apenas não sabe como se comunicar com os outras pessoas**. Komi-san, que deseja corrigir este mau hábito dela, tenta melhorar com a ajuda do Tadano-kun...

altTitles.ja: はんどすたんど！
